ValidationRule.description: Prevents users who are not assigned the Comprehensive Campaign Manager permission from editing comprehensive campaign records.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='Comprehensive_Campaign', NOT($Permission.HAM_Comprehensive_Campaign_Manager), OR( ISCHANGED(Name), ISCHANGED(IsActive), ISCHANGED(Type), ISCHANGED(ParentId), ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId), ISCHANGED(Status), ISCHANGED(StartDate), ISCHANGED(EndDate), ISCHANGED(HAM_Dollars_Public_Goal__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Comprehensive Campaign Managers can edit comprehensive campaigns
